BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Disabilities and Addiction

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing accessibility guidelines for printed documents
Items.MatterName: Establishing accessibility guidelines for printed documents.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing information on wheelchair repair providers
Items.MatterName: Providing information on wheelchair repair providers.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to introduce and pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation to increase funding for Assertive Community Treatment teams.
Items.MatterName: Increase funding for Assertive Community Treatment teams.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to introduce and pass, and the President to sign, legislation to incorporate mental wellness training within OSHA-10 and OSHA-30 training.
Items.MatterName: Incorporate mental wellness training within OSHA-10 and OSHA-30 training.
